gradient.description: Gradient configuration, ignored when variant is not gradient, theme.defaultGradient by default
gradient.description_zh: Gradient 配置，当 variant 不是 gradient 时忽略，默认为 theme.defaultGradient

inherit.description: Determines whether font properties should be inherited from the parent, false by default
inherit.description_zh: 确定是否应从父级继承字体属性，默认情况下为 false

inline.description: Sets line-height to 1 for centering, false by default
inline.description_zh: 将 line-height 设置为 1 以进行居中，默认为 false

lineClamp.description: Number of lines after which Text will be truncated

size.description: Controls font-size and line-height, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 控制 font-size 和 line-height，默认为 'md'

span.description: Shorthand for component="span", false by default, default root element is p
span.description_zh: component=“span” 的简写，默认为 false，默认根元素为 p

truncate.description: Side on which Text must be truncated, if true, text is truncated from the start
truncate.description_zh: 必须截断文本的一侧，如果为 true，则从头开始截断文本
